title: The man who understands (this is a riddle)
content:
There is a man who understands that he understands nothing.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]

Questions please.Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
"I always try to consume interesting animals."-LevelLord

title: lol
content: And there's an exception to every rule -- except this one.  :-)

title: More is less:
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]There is a man who understands that he understands nothing[hr][/quote]

The more you know, the more you know you don't know.

Your 'riddle' basically means the man learned about something, and with that knowlage, was able to ask better questions. We ask questions to find out something we don't know. The more questions, the more you don't know.

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: More is less:
content: I'll give you one name: Socrates. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-disguised.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Melt Data Hire
content:
Yah, I love that quote, "I know one thing and that is that I know nothing."

I also like this one, though it's not exactly a riddle, nor even a quote (that I'm aware of), just something that cropped up in my head last year: "If you want what you have, you'll always have what you need."

Argh! 1338! I missed my Elite post! *dredges*Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A proud member of the Made LevelLord Change Her Sig society

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Melt Data Hire
content: Hehe, that's a nice one Spleen. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] At least I've never seen it before. Good chances are that you're the first one to say that.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Melt Data Hire
content:
Sorry Spleen, guess you'll have to start all over.

We can probably expect a good dose of spam from the new Spleen so he can build back to 1337 posts. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]

title: Re: Melt Data Hire
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Sorry Spleen, guess you'll have to start all over.[hr][/quote]

Um... the more I thought you knew, the more I know you don't know... did that make sense?!?-14- NAJAWA -14-

title: Re: Melt Data Hire
content: Yes, although it doesn't make any sense why you quoted that piece of text.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Melt Data Hire
content:
'The more I see of men, the more I like of dogs.'

'Ravens are like writing desks, they both have quills.'

'The more you know, the better you may appreciate your ignorance.'

'There are only two things that are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the universe.'

'If only it were foolproof, but fools are so ingenious!'

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
